text: Verner Løvgreen (July 29, 1910 - May 6, 1990) was a Danish canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was born in Copenhagen and died in Tårnby. In 1936 he and his partner Axel Svendsen finished fourth in the K-2 10000 m event. Løvgreen and Svendsen also competed in the K-2 1000 m event and finished seventh. ==References== *Sports-reference.com profile Category:1910 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Danish male canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of Denmark
title: Verner Løvgreen
